lexUnit.name: mayor.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the elected head of the municipal corporation of a city or borough.

sentence.text: The first Mayor so to be honoured was , appropriately enough , Mr. Winterbottom , Lady Vernon 's Steward , who was Mayor in 1831 and 1832 .
